description.narrative:
Output 2.4 • Provide assistance to baseline assessment of WASH services in Kilifi county and conduct regular assessments to determine effectiveness of strategies • Establish and strengthen the WASH TWG in the county • Coordinate county and other stakeholders for a sustainable WASH solution • Ensure and strengthen implementation of CLTS at community with support from the CHMT • Support distribution and dissemination of the MoH improved Sanitation Communication toolkit and WASH IEC material • Support hygiene related activities through trained Hygiene champions, use of mass media, and visibility during the World Toilet Day and Global hand washing events • Support selected communities to achieve ODF
Output 2.5 • Provide assistance to baseline assessment of nutritional situation in the county and conduct regular assessments to determine effectiveness of strategies • Sensitize the facilities and C/SHMTs on the nutrition package of services • Establish and strengthen the Nutritional TWG in the county • Increase capacity of county and sub county to support planning, implementation, and monitoring of nutritional activities • Support/facilitate OJTs on good Nutrition and feeding practices • Build capacity of facility and community health workers on IYCF and enable them to identify nutritional challenges in the community • Focus on empowering the young adolescent mothers on proper nutrition and feeding practices • Enhance nutrition awareness in community and provide information on proper nutrition • Support households to initiate Kitchen gardens • Support dissemination and distribution of nutrition policies and guidelines
